title: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds secretly welcomed third child two months ago
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Blake Lively and husband Ryan Reynolds secretly welcomed their third child over two months ago, according to reports.

Ryan, 42, and the Blake, 31, who already have daughters Inez, 2, and four-year-old James, have not formally announced the news.

The gorgeous pair, who married in 2012, announced the baby news at the premiere of Pokémon: Detective Pikachu in May.

At the time People reported: “They are so happy and excited about having another baby.

(Image: Jackie Brown)

(Image: Instagram)

"They really are the most in-love and in-tune couple, and very hands-on parents. They’d have a dozen kids if they could.”

The pair are known in Hollywood circles as couple goals and often banter on social media.

Back in August the Hollywood actor poked fun at his partner, who is expecting their third child, by sharing snaps of her looking less than perfect.

In the snaps, Blake still looks stunning, but she's seen make-up-free and mostly has her eyes closed.

Ryan posted them on his Instagram page, and wrote: "Happy Birthday Blake Lively."
description: The Hollywood couple have announced the new to pals more than two months ago, according to sources
